title.description: Title or name of the survey.

active.description: Indicates whether the survey is currently active or not.

created_at.description: The date and time when the survey was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the survey was last updated.

questions.description: Array of questions included in the survey.

label.description: Text label or prompt for the question.

accepted_ratings.description: Array of accepted ratings for the question.

default.description: Default value for the question if not answered.
